title: How to merge two WhatsApp chats history - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello, thanks for the A2A. As far as I know, WhatsApp does not allow merging of conversations. Though the idea is not a bad one. You would have to select all messages of a conversation and then resend them to the new conversation. Though of course, time and date sent are incorrect and order of messages might also be affected, as those messages would appear as new messages on the end of the conversation.
This comprehensive albeit rather technical guide should do it. [GUIDE] Merge Multiple Whatsapp Backup File Into One (No Root Required)
